Title: Valid login
Description: User logs in with valid credentials
Steps:
1. Go to login page
2. Enter valid username and password
3. Click login

Title: Invalid login with wrong password
Description: User tries to login with wrong password
Steps:
1. Go to login page
2. Enter valid username and wrong password
3. Click login
Expected Result: Error message 'Invalid username or password' shown

Title: Empty username
Description: User tries to login without username
Steps:
1. Go to login page
2. Leave username empty
3. Enter any password
4. Click login
